name: Vue
desc: Vue Js is a powerfull, light and handy web framework that i use with Option API combined with Typescript

name: TypeScript
desc: Basically Javascript with Types. I started using it because it is fun secure and easy to maintain than Js.

name: JavsScript
desc: One of the most popular coding language for web development. An Object Oriented Programing language which was my first programing language.

name: Sass/Scss
desc: A popular preprocessor of CSS that provides possibilities not included in CSS like functions, variable, etc... It can be very usefull for big project.

name: Html 5
desc: Hypertext Markup Language, One of the basics of web development.

name: Css 3
desc: HTML5 's binomial. CSS or Cascading Style Sheet is a styling language that pairs to HTML to get stunning result in your website.

name: Express Js
desc: Express Js is a minimalistic NodeJs backend framework that i use to build web server for applications.

name: Node Js
desc: Node Js is a development environment that allows the execution of Javascript on the server side. That is why it is mostly used to create web servers.

name: Less
desc: Less is another CSS preprocessor like Scss/Sass. It provides the same possibilities but with few differences. I did learn it during my intership in 2023.

name: MongoDB
desc: A Database Management System (DBMS) for non-relational database. It unables unstructured data storage which can be confusing.

name: MySQL
desc: MySQL, opposite to MongoDb is a DBMS for relational databases. My very first DBMS.

name: Adobe Photoshop
desc: Photoshop is a software from the Adobe suite. It is a professional and powerful software for image treatment.

name: Adobe Illustrator
desc: Illustrator, like photoshop is a software from the Adobe suite but unlike it, it is dedicated to graphic design and vector shapes.

name: Clip Studio Paint
desc: Clip Studio Paint is a dedicades drawing software tool which is one of the most complete and powerfull of its type.

name: MedibangPaint Pro
desc: MedibangPaint Pro is another dedicades drawing software. It is free and powerfull enough to get you some amazing result.
